name: Spatial War
description:
Welcome recruit, we need your help to fight the rebel scum and save the galaxy!

During the campaign you will go from a new recruit to a war hero, destroying the rebels and saving the alliance. You will be send on different missions, ranging from protecting important transport ships to taking on massive war ships.

After saving the alliance you can still fight endless waves of enemies in order to reach the highest score possible. Or you can play some deathmatch, fighting alongside fellow recruits(bots) and destroying all enemy ships before they destroy you.

Note: A mouse is required.
